Container.Name: OctoEverywhereforBambulab
Container.Overview:
Unofficial [Docker container](https://hub.docker.com/r/ntebis/octoeverywhere_bambulab) for Bambulab Octoeverywhere. Still some work in progress. Please report any bugs in the [issue tracker](https://github.com/ntebis/octoeverywhere_bambulab_docker/issues).
Features request will not be done as [Quinn Damerell](https://github.com/QuinnDamerell) of Octoeverywhere will be creating an official container at some point. Please direct your feature requests there.
For Unraid related bugs, please also use the issue tracker for now.

Config.Name: Access Code
Config.Description:
Enter the 8 digit access code of your printer
https://3dprinteros.helpdocs.io/3dpos-basics/how-to-connect-bambulabs-printers-to-3-dprinter-os#:~:text=On%20the%20Bambu%20Lab%20P1,switch%20to%20LAN%20Only%20Mode.

Config.Name: Printer Serial Number
Config.Description: Enter the Serial number of the printer. The Serial number is usually 15 digits https://wiki.bambulab.com/en/general/find-sn
